trans-unit.source: Provides enumeration support for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 열거형을 지원 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features.
trans-unit.target: 글꼴 패밀리는 글꼴 서체 Arial 등 않았지만 다른 기능 집합이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: These feature differences include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>, such as italic, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>, such as bold.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 기능 차이 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>, 기울임꼴 등 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>, 굵게.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members
trans-unit.target: ![글꼴](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "글꼴") "Times New Roman" 글꼴 패밀리 구성원 인 서체의 예

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from a string value that represents the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 글꼴의 위치를 나타내는 문자열 값에서 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 글꼴을 포함 하는 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 의 되는 글꼴을 나타내는 개체를 location 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The location is .
trans-unit.target: The location is .

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 전달할 수 없으며 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>경로로 처리 되므로이 매개 변수, 또는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 에서 개체는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 글꼴의 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 기본 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 글꼴이 위치의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in baseUri.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 의 되는 글꼴을 나타내는 개체를 baseUri 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 자료를 사용 하는 개체 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 글꼴 위치를 확인 하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 기본 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 글꼴이 위치의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 글꼴을 포함 하는 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 의 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 확인된 된 글꼴 위치에서 글꼴을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from a string value that represents the font directory location.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"> </xref> 글꼴 디렉터리 위치를 나타내는 문자열 값에서 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 글꼴을 포함 하는 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 의 되는 글꼴을 나타내는 개체를 location 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The location is .
trans-unit.target: The location is .

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 전달할 수 없으며 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>경로로 처리 되므로이 매개 변수, 또는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the font location.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"> </xref> 에서 개체는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 글꼴 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.target: 기본 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 글꼴이 위치의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in baseUri.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 의 되는 글꼴을 나타내는 개체를 baseUri 합니다.

trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"> </xref> 자료를 사용 하는 개체 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 글꼴 위치를 확인 하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 글꼴을 포함 하는 위치입니다.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 의 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"> </xref> 확인된 된 글꼴 위치에서 글꼴을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from the default system font location.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 기본 시스템 글꼴 위치에서 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the system fonts collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 의 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 시스템 글꼴 컬렉션에서 글꼴을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from the default system font location.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"> </xref> 기본 시스템 글꼴 위치에서 개체입니다.
